Name: Time Offset
Meaning:
Time Offset in Seconds from UTC                   
(note: deprecated by 100 and 101)

Name: Boot File Size
Meaning: Size of boot file in 512 byte chunks

Name: Merit Dump File
Meaning: Client to dump and name the file to dump it to

Name: Domain Name
Meaning: The DNS domain name of the client

Name: Extension File
Meaning: Path name for more BOOTP info

Name: IPv6-Only Preferred
Meaning: Number of seconds that DHCPv4 should be disabled

Name: OPTION_DHCP4O6_S46_SADDR
Meaning: DHCPv4 over DHCPv6 Softwire Source Address Option

Name:
TFTP Server IP address (for IP
Phone software load)

Diffserv Code Point (DSCP) for
VoIP signalling and media streams
SIP UA Configuration Service Domains
Meaning: List of domain names to search for SIP User Agent Configuration

Name: OPTION-IPv4_Address-ANDSF
Meaning: ANDSF IPv4 Address Option for DHCPv4

Name: OPTION_V4_SZTP_REDIRECT
Meaning: This option provides a list of URIs for SZTP bootstrap servers

Name: OPTION_V4_DOTS_RI
Meaning: The name of the peer DOTS agent.

Name: OPTION_V4_DOTS_ADDRESS
Meaning: N/4 IPv4 addresses of peer DOTS agent(s).

Name: status-code
Meaning: Status code and optional N byte text message describing status.

Name: base-time
Meaning: Absolute time (seconds since Jan 1, 1970) message was sent.

Name: start-time-of-state
Meaning: Number of seconds in the past when client entered current state.

Name: query-start-time
Meaning: Absolute time (seconds since Jan 1, 1970) for beginning of query.

Name: query-end-time
Meaning: Absolute time (seconds since Jan 1, 1970) for end of query.

Name: data-source
Meaning: Indicates information came from local or remote server.

Name: OPTION_V4_PCP_SERVER
Meaning: Includes one or multiple lists of PCP server IP addresses; each list is treated as a separate PCP server.

Name: OPTION_V4_PORTPARAMS
Meaning: This option is used to configure a set of ports bound to a shared IPv4 address.

Name: Unassigned
Meaning: Previously assigned by [RFC7710]; known to also be used by Polycom.
